alert.note: Alert for Amelia; Chesterfield; Dinwiddie (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 16 at 2:53PM EDT until July 16 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CHESTERFIELD...NORTHERN DINWIDDIE AND SOUTHEASTERN AMELIA COUNTIES... At 252 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southeast of Mannboro, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Sutherland around 345 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Center Star, Petersburg Airport, Church Road, Five Forks, Burgess, Walkers, Hebron, Ammon and Ford. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
